1471430.name: Somewhen
1471430.description:
It's a town-building, turn-based RPG wrapped in a time travel story where you guide an unlikely group of six to put a ruined timeline on the right track. It's TIME to rebuild!!

Discover blueprints and use the intuitive Chronorama building system to weave a new fate for everyone! Build houses, trees, rivers to support your diorama-like towns and watch them age between two distinct periods of time. Go back and forth between eras to solve puzzles, discover secrets, and fix the timeline!
